headline: Here's What to Expect From Builders FirstSource's Next Earnings Report
summary: Builders FirstSource is expected to announce its third-quarter results next week, and analysts predict a double-digit decline in the company’s bottom-line figure.

headline: Builders FirstSource (BLDR): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q2 Earnings?
summary: Even though Builders FirstSource (currently trading at $122.51 per share) has gained 7.4% over the last six months, it has lagged the S&P 500’s 30.6% return during that period. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
